channel.title: 400 duboce on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in 400 duboce on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: San Francisco Habitation, Take Two
item.description: Last week I took two days off work and, combined with the three day weekend, uprooted my San Francisco existence to date, relocating to the Dogpatch .

item.title: 400 Duboce #113, Now from “Greg Apartments”
item.description: So things are continuing to get a little weird at my current building.

item.title: Communication and Trust
item.description: This afternoon I left work early to visit my landlord and try to iron out an issue that I’ve been dealing with for over two weeks.
